## Utility.clickedOutside() method

Checks if global click happened outside of component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static clickedOutside(target: Node, id: string, exceptId?: string | null, exceptTag?: string | null): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | Node | target of click event |
|  id | string | id of the component |
|  exceptId | string \| null | id of the exception component to not trigger outside click (default null) |
|  exceptTag | string \| null | string value of HTML tag that is inside excepted container, but triggers outside click (for case when there are multiple children inside excepted container |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

boolean - true/false if global click happened outside of the component
